channel.title: How do i add customs please
channel.description: How do i add customs please post reply :)

item.title: How do i add customs please
item.dc:creator: @attk_mast3r attk mast3r
item.description:
@attk_mast3r wrote:

[quote=“pl0x15, post:2, topic:337216”]go to Config > WeaponHandler (click it) then go to the bottom and type something like this depending on wut u wna add)

item = (itemid) (tabbutton) (name of item) (bonuses) (i think theres 10 bonuses) then u save it and make a model for the item. Which u can find in the models section. (i know this is confusing but i am in a hurry.[/quote]

and if there is no weapon handler?

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add customs please

item.title: How do i add customs please
item.dc:creator: @pl0x15 pl0x15
item.description:
@pl0x15 wrote:

go to Config > WeaponHandler (click it) then go to the bottom and type something like this depending on wut u wna add)

item = (itemid) (tabbutton) (name of item) (bonuses) (i think theres 10 bonuses) then u save it and make a model for the item. Which u can find in the models section. (i know this is confusing but i am in a hurry.

Read full topic
